description: Lists all watchlists in a specified domain.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours.

nested_items.name: WatchlistSummaries
nested_items.description: A list that contains details about each watchlist in the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the watchlist was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultWatchlist
nested_items.description: Whether the specified watchlist is the default watchlist of a domain.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the watchlist.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the watchlist was last updated.
